department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: The Government of Canada through this Request for Supply Arrangements (RFSA), intends to establish and maintain Supply Arrangements (SAs) with suppliers to provide Marine Technical Services for one or more of the streams identified below for one or more types of vessels and hull construction materials, and for various regions/subregions in accordance with the Statement of Requirement (SOR) - Annex A.
tags: FTAs with Peru, Colombia, Panama, Korea, UK
full_summary:
=============

**Request for Supply Arrangement for Marine Technical Services**

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
**Commodity Group:** Naval Architecture - Consulting Services (C216AA)

**Specifications:**

* Streams of Work:
	+ Vessel Condition Survey
	+ Towing Assessment
	+ Remediation Assessment
	+ Disposal Assessment
* Regions/Sub-regions: Canada-wide, including areas subject to Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements (CLCAs) and the Nunavut Land Claims Agreement (NLCA)
* Type of Vessels/Hull Construction Materials: Various

**Objective:** The Government of Canada is seeking to establish and maintain Supply Arrangements (SAs) with suppliers to provide Marine Technical Services for one or more of the streams identified above for one or more types of vessels and hull construction materials, and for various regions/sub-regions in accordance with the Statement of Requirement (SOR) - Annex A.

**Notice URL:** None
**Attachment:** [Link to RFSA document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2024/03/26/478de0d2ef771b91ce82778000f0d3d0/ABES.PROD.PW_MER.B003.E29326.EBSU000.PDF)

**Contact Information:**

* Andrea Jeakins, Contracting Authority
* Phone: (343) 541-7428
* Email: andrea.jeakins@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Important Note:** Existing qualified suppliers who have been issued a supply arrangement under EVC01-202002/A, /B or /C are not required to submit a new arrangement as a result of this refresh if no changes to the SA are required. See the RFSA for additional information. Suppliers must use the CPC Connect service provided by Canada Post Corporation to transmit their arrangement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canada-EU Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-United States-Mexico Agreement (CUSMA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Proc
